item.title: Mentioned by VOCM
item.description:
Cod Cops Over-reacting?
St. John's South-Mount Pearl MP Ryan Cleary says he's concerned with safety issues and harrassment on the water as the provincial recreational fishery continues. Cleary told VOCM Open Line with Bill Rowe that because this province has fewer days and a ...

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
Cleary balks at security bill for St. John's harbour fence
A New Democratic MP says he was surprised to learn there will be round-the-clock security at St. John's harbour, even after a controversial fence is completed. The permanent barrier, which will cover a stretch of Harbour Drive, and face prominent structures like the Fortis Building and Atlantic Place, is now under construction. Ryan Cleary, who represents St. John's South-Mount Pearl, said a plan to provide 24/7 security at the site flies in the face of what the St. John's Port Authority told him by phone in January.

item.title: Mentioned by VOCM
item.description:
Ferry Cost Reason for Drop in Traffic: MP
MP Ryan Cleary says he believes the cost of travel on the Marine Atlantic ferry is the reason behind a drop in passenger traffic in the early part of the season. Marine Atlantic says passenger traffic was down 4.5 per cent for May and June of this year. Cleary ...

item.title: Mentioned by VOCM
item.description:
Qalipu Applicants Treated Unfairly: MP
The MP for St. John's South-Mount Pearl says that Qalipu Mi'kmaq First Nation applicants have been treated unfairly. Ryan Cleary spoke in the House of Commons yesterday to a motion concerning the Qalibu First Nation recognition and registration process.

item.title: Mentioned by VOCM
item.description:
MP wants Intervention in Airport Strike
MP Ryan Cleary is requesting an independent mediator to help resolve the ongoing labour dispute at the St. John's International Airport. Cleary fears the upcoming tourism season will be affected by the strike, as well as the economy of the northeast Avalon.
